navbar.masaryk: Tracing the footsteps of T.G. Masaryk

home_page.welcome: Welcome to a territory with a unique history
home_page.connect: connected by the footbridge over the Morava River
home_page.events_description: The following events are coming up in the near future:
home_page.map_description: On this map you will find four important towns connected with a rich history that is intertwined with the Morava River.
home_page.themes_description: Explore and discover the main areas of history that characterise our locality. Each section offers a unique perspective on the significant events and cultural heritage that have shaped our history.
home_page.about_project_description: The idea of the joint project arose from the common need of the project partners to connect the offer of cultural tourist attractions and events in the cross-border area Hodonín - Mikulčice - Kopčany - Holíč.
home_page.archive_text: Take a look at our joint events and feel free to participate in the following ones! :)
